entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 mm. Snowfall amount 30 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
